title: LolClient.exe is not responding error in Champ Select.
body:
Just got a weird bug in champ select. Screen froze and got LolClient.exe is not responding.

Description:
  A problem caused this program to stop interacting with Windows.

Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	AppHangB1
  Application Name:	LolClient.exe
  Application Version:	0.0.0.0
  Application Timestamp:	515663e0
  Hang Signature:	577d
  Hang Type:	0
  OS Version:	6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.1
  Locale ID:	1033
  Additional Hang Signature 1:	577de316fad20d973957d43a05ac3fee
  Additional Hang Signature 2:	3d54
  Additional Hang Signature 3:	3d546aa7944af577146c61beccfd1558
  Additional Hang Signature 4:	577d
  Additional Hang Signature 5:	577de316fad20d973957d43a05ac3fee
  Additional Hang Signature 6:	3d54
  Additional Hang Signature 7:	3d546aa7944af577146c61beccfd1558

Don't know if this helps or not.

At the time of error, I was picking my champ, Morgana.

replies.body:
This specific behavior is commonly caused by the client experiencing an unstable connection to the League servers. Most of the time, this is a direct result of conflicting network settings either on your computer or router. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start troubleshooting this, so I recommend giving that guide a looksie.

Let me know if you encounter this issue again.
